resources.string: To hide chatroom option from main menu go to settings page. To join a room you can either select one from public room select or you can directly join a room by selecting join option or else you can create you own room by selecting create option. you can acess multiple rooms at a time by clicking + symbol adding rooms to your room list in chat room page. To kick a user from chat room you should be owner of that room To block a user from contacting you click on the user name on users list and select option BLOCK. To send private message type username:message(Eg Albert:Hello)Username is case sensitive,if you dont type username correctly message wont be send. To leave a room go to room setting and select LEAVE option.
